This is the home-page of Karl Voit.

On this page you can see the latest blog updates. For further articles, please use the search bar or navigate through the blue tags. My personal favourites are pim, privacy, or security.

I recommend any decent RSS/Atom aggregator to get notified on blog updates.

Please notice: The software building this site is under constant development. See current status of the blogging software and the next steps.
